references.paper_title: Video-MME: The first-ever comprehensive evaluation benchmark of multi-modal LLMs in video analysis
references.reason: It is a benchmark dataset used for evaluating the performance of various models in video understanding tasks, which is crucial for comparing the proposed CoS method with existing approaches.

references.paper_title: LongVA: Large-scale chain-of-thought prompting for long video understanding
references.reason: It is one of the main baselines used in the experiments of the paper for comparing the proposed approach, suggesting its significance in the field.

references.paper_title: Video-XL: Extra-long vision language model for hour-scale video understanding
references.reason: It is another main baseline used in the experiments, demonstrating its importance as a state-of-the-art method in long video understanding.

references.paper_title: ST-LLM: Large language models are effective temporal learners
references.reason: It proposes a method for temporal learning using large language models, which is relevant to the core concept of the proposed CoS method.

references.paper_title: MLVU: A comprehensive benchmark for multi-task long video understanding
references.reason: It is a long-video benchmark dataset used in the experiments, helping in evaluating the performance of the proposed CoS method on various long-video understanding tasks.
